info.name: Fandom.com clean wiki
info.description: Aims to make Fandom.com wikis cleaner on desktop.
info.additionalInfo:
Chages various things, such as widens the content area, removes toolbars cluttering pages, hides ads etc. to make Fandom.com wikis look better on big monitors and use their available space more efficiently.
May 11 2019: First release.
